name: Perfect Paint
description: Perfect Primer Perfect Paint is the complete sealer, primer, and paint in one designed specially for sealing asbestos mastic, VCT tile, cutback glues, lead paint and other difficult and dangerous coatings. PerfectPaint applies directly onto existing asbestos mastic, tile, wood, concrete, or black mastic. The PerfectPaint system comes with our PerfectCleaner floor prep treatment that safely cleans and conditions surfaces without disturbing them, to maximize their adhesion to coatings.
